nodes.text: Le Tang is a storyboard and previsualization artist for Star Wars: The Clone Wars, a CGI-based television series that debuted October 3, 2008 on Cartoon Network as a continuation of the film with the same name, released 2 months prior.
Tang was also an animator for the Pirates of the Caribbean: The Legend of Jack Sparrow, a video game for PlayStation 2, Xbox, and PC.
